Package nusri.fyp.demo.service.img_sender

Class ImageSenderService

java.lang.Object
nusri.fyp.demo.service.img_sender.ImageSenderService
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImageSenderServiceImplOfEoid, ImageSenderServiceImplOfRoboflow
@Service public abstract class ImageSenderService extends Object
Abstract image sending service that defines common methods for sending video frames/images to the backend model for recognition.
This class includes common logic for reading videos and processing them frame by frame. Specific send implementation is completed by subclasses.

  • Field Details

    • configService

      private final ConfigService configService

    • tempFiles

      public final Map<String,File> tempFiles
      A map that stores temporary files associated with each user. The map's key is the user identifier, and the value is the temporary file created for that user.

    • totleFramesMap

      public final Map<String,Long> totleFramesMap
      A map that stores the total number of frames for each video file associated with a user. The map's key is the user identifier, and the value is the total number of frames for the video.

    • progressMap

      public final Map<String,Map<Long,List<? extends AbstractActionObservation>>> progressMap
      A map that tracks the processing progress for each video file per user. The map's key is the user identifier, and the value is a map where keys are frame timestamps (in milliseconds), and values are lists of action observations corresponding to each frame.

    • sendingProcesses

      public final Map<String,List<CompletableFuture<List<AbstractActionObservation>>>> sendingProcesses
      A map that stores ongoing image sending processes for each user. The map's key is the user identifier, and the value is a list of CompletableFuture tasks that represent the sending process for each frame.

  • Constructor Details

    • ImageSenderService

      public ImageSenderService(ConfigService configService)
      Constructor that injects the config service.
      Parameters:
      configService - The configuration service object.

  • Method Details

    • sendFrame

      public abstract List<? extends AbstractActionObservation> sendFrame(org.opencv.core.Mat frame) throws IOException
      Synchronously sends an image frame for recognition (OpenCV Mat format).
      Parameters:
      frame - The OpenCV Mat object representing a single image frame.
      Returns:
      A list of action observations corresponding to this frame.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O problem occurs during sending.

    • sendFrame

      public abstract List<? extends AbstractActionObservation> sendFrame(String frame)
      Synchronously sends an image frame (Base64 string).
      Parameters:
      frame - The Base64 encoded image string.
      Returns:
      A list of action observations corresponding to this frame.

    • sendFrameAsync

      public abstract CompletableFuture<List<AbstractActionObservation>> sendFrameAsync(org.opencv.core.Mat frame, String user)
      Asynchronously sends an image frame for recognition.
      Parameters:
      frame - The OpenCV Mat object representing a single image frame.
      user - The user identifier, used to distinguish different sessions or processing workflows.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture containing the list of recognition results.

    • interrupt

      public abstract void interrupt(String user)
      Interrupts the ongoing recognition process for the current user, including canceling asynchronous tasks.
      Parameters:
      user - The user identifier.

    • sendVideoFile

      public Map<Long,List<? extends AbstractActionObservation>> sendVideoFile(File file, String user) throws IOException
      Reads the entire video file (frame by frame) and sends it to the model service. Frames can be skipped based on the frame interval from configService.
      Parameters:
      file - The video file to be processed.
      user - The user identifier.
      Returns:
      A map where keys are frame timestamps (in milliseconds), and values are the corresponding recognition results for each frame.
      Throws:
      IOException - If reading the file or decoding the video fails.

    • processVideoFrames

      public Map<List<? extends AbstractActionObservation>,Long> processVideoFrames(byte[] videoData) throws IOException
      Processes and sends the binary data of a specified video (frame by frame) to the model service.
      Parameters:
      videoData - A byte array containing the full video content.
      Returns:
      A map where the keys are lists of action observations, and the values are frame timestamps.
      Throws:
      IOException - If video decoding or sending fails.

    • processImg

      public void processImg(String img, String timestamp, StateMachine stateMachine)
      Processes a single image and updates the recognition results in the specified state machine.
      Parameters:
      img - The Base64 encoded image.
      timestamp - The timestamp or frame identifier.
      stateMachine - The specified state machine.
